title: Homesite Bold Condensed serif
content:
What the heck is this thing? Kinda century bold condensed -ish. BTW I added the dot over the i to help out What the Font. No luck.   
   
Thanks,   
Randy   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141312im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20739.gif)
author: aquatoad

comments.content: Sorry Randy the system is getting soooo slow. Randy did you look at ITC Cheltenham?
Not Cheltenham, check the terminals on the s. Right flavor though.
Looks a lot like Stone or Stone Print to me, particularly the **s**. Maybe some of the characters were modified.

Trying to do a quick re-create of a logo because the vectors are very slow in coming from the client. You're right Mark, the **s** is very Stone. It's doubtfull that this is custom. More likely a font distributed with Corel Draw or something. � R

Between Cheltenham and Stone I was able to reduce the recreation time to less than 15minutes. I didn't bother to fix the cheltenham serifs since this is going to be used small. Thanks! � R   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141312im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20783.gif)
